Bases: object

Class responsible for converting an Individual into a Keras Model and the evaluation

get_function_input_list()[source]¶

generate a list containing the fpipunction names and a list containing the number of inputs for each function

improved(child_number, score)[source]¶

function is called if the cgp evolution strategy finds a better individual

Parameters:
  • child_number (int) – child index
  • score (float) – score of the better individual
individual_to_keras_model(individual, child_number=0)[source]¶

creates a keras model based on an individual

Parameters:
  • individual (Individual) – instance of an individual where an keras model should be created
  • child_number (int) – a valid index or id
Returns:
Return type:

an individual if a model could be translated otherwise None
name_to_layer(name, idx)[source]¶

creates an instance of a keras layer based on the constant function mapping

Parameters:
  • name (str) – layer name, must be the key in function_mapping
  • idx – some index or id what ever to make a layer name unique
Returns:

a valid keras layer
Return type:

keras.layer
